intro: Actinostemma tenerum, commonly known as the slender actinostemma, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and other related species. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or white in color. It thrives in dry, rocky habitats and is often found in coastal areas. Due to its unique appearance and habitat, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
